author: VinInn
body:
status
works for run1 geometry (at least does not crash)
does not work for run2 (at least 2022)

see #38739

the test does not find products  (getByLabel broken?)

updated status:
should work for all Eras and geometry models.
the  propagator "old" test needs a "refresh": it was based on the early use of Geane for Muon reconstruction the has been obsoleted years ago. It cannot even work at the moment as current propagator is limited to 2m
title: Try to fix GeometryProducer and G4e examples
